subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Adrian Peterson’s 8-yard touchdown run, started by a shoulder-shake to fake Chicago linebacker Brian Urlacher at the line of scrimmage, sent the Minnesota Vikings to their fifth consecutive victory, 20-13, over the visiting Bears on Monday night.
snippet: Adrian Peterson’s 8-yard touchdown run, started by a shoulder-shake to fake Chicago linebacker Brian Urlacher at the line of scrimmage, sent the Minnesota Vikings to their fifth consecutive victory, 20-13, over the visiting Bears on Monday night.
